verses.verse: And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H4729>burn<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H7848>upon<s%>: of acacia <S%H6086>wood<s%> shalt thou make <S%H6213>it<s%>.

A <S%H520>cubit<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H7251>thereof<s%>; foursquare shall it <S%H520>be<s%>; and two cubits shall be the <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H7161>thereof<s%>: the horns thereof shall be of one piece with it.

And thou shalt <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H1406>top<s%> <S%H7023>thereof<s%>, and the sides thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H6213>thereof<s%>; and thou shalt make unto it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> for it under the <S%H2213>crown<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>; upon the two <S%H6763>ribs<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>, upon the two <S%H6654>sides<s%> of it shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H1004>them<s%>; and they shall be for places for <S%H905>staves<s%> <S%H1992>wherewith<s%> to bear <S%H5375>it<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> that is by the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> that is over the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, where I will meet with <S%H3259>thee<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> thereon <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H1242>spices<s%>: every morning, when he <S%H3190>dresseth<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, he shall burn <S%H6999>it<s%>.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5927>lighteth<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>, he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H8548>it<s%>, a perpetual <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Ye shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> no <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H4503>thereon<s%>, nor burnt-offering, nor <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>; and ye shall <S%H5258>pour<s%> no <S%H5262>drink-offering<s%> thereon.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of it <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%>; with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> shall he make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>: it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When thou <S%H5375>takest<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according to those that are <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H5414>them<s%>, then shall they give every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for his <S%H5315>soul<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when thou <S%H6485>numberest<s%> <S%H5063>them<s%>; that there be no plague among <S%H6485>them<s%>, when thou numberest them.

This they shall <S%H5414>give<s%>, every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> unto them that are <S%H6485>numbered<s%>: <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> (the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>), <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> for an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> over unto them that are <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H5414>upward<s%>, shall give the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

The <S%H6223>rich<s%> shall not give <S%H7235>more<s%>, and the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall not give <S%H4591>less<s%>, than the <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, when they <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and shalt <S%H5414>appoint<s%> it for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>; that it may be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for your <S%H5315>souls<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thou shalt also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3595>laver<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and the <S%H3653>base<s%> thereof of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, whereat to <S%H7364>wash<s%>. And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> it between the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> water <S%H4325>therein<s%>.
And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their feet <S%H7272>thereat<s%>:

when they <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5066>not<s%>; or when they come near to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%>, to burn an <S%H6999>offering<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

So they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, that they <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H2706>not<s%>: and it shall be a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to <S%H2233>them<s%>, even to him and to his seed throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
Moreover <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> thou also unto thee the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1314>spices<s%>: of <S%H1865>flowing<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H1314>shekels<s%>, and of sweet <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> so <S%H4276>much<s%>, even two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and of <S%H1314>sweet<s%> <S%H7070>calamus<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>,
and of <S%H6916>cassia<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, and of <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> a <S%H1969>hin<s%>;

and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> it a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, a <S%H7545>perfume<s%> <S%H4842>compounded<s%> after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer<s%>: it shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> therewith the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>,
and the <S%H7979>table<s%> and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H4501>thereof<s%>, and the candlestick and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H4196>thereof<s%>, and the altar of <S%H7004>incense<s%>,
and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> with all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H3595>thereof<s%>, and the laver and the base <S%H3653>thereof<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H6944>them<s%>, that they may be most <S%H6944>holy<s%>: whatsoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3547>them<s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> unto me throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Upon the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall it not be <S%H3251>poured<s%>, neither shall ye <S%H6213>make<s%> any like <S%H4971>it<s%>, according to the composition <S%H6944>thereof<s%>: it is holy, and it shall be holy unto <S%H6944>you<s%>.
Whosoever <S%H834><s%> <S%H7543>compoundeth<s%> any like <S%H5414>it<s%>, or whosoever putteth any of it upon a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>, he shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> unto thee sweet <S%H5561>spices<s%>, <S%H5198>stacte<s%>, and <S%H7827>onycha<s%>, and <S%H2464>galbanum<s%>; <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H5561>spices<s%> with <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>: of <S%H905>each<s%> shall there be a like <S%H905>weight<s%>;

and thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> of it <S%H7004>incense<s%>, a <S%H7004>perfume<s%> after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer<s%>, <S%H4414>seasoned<s%> with <S%H2889>salt<s%>, pure and <S%H6944>holy<s%>:

and thou shalt <S%H7833>beat<s%> some of it very <S%H1854>small<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> of it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, where I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with <S%H6944>thee<s%>: it shall be unto you most <S%H6944>holy<s%>.

And the <S%H7004>incense<s%> which thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%>, according to the <S%H4971>composition<s%> thereof ye shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> for <S%H6944>yourselves<s%>: it shall be unto thee holy for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Whosoever <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> like unto <S%H7306>that<s%>, to smell <S%H3772>thereof<s%>, he shall be cut off from his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
